issue.title: Add Edit menu item to Model Editor toolbar

content.raw:
just noticed there are two styles of menu accelerators in the ui.   one has the keyboard accelerator in parentheses and the the other is right-aligned in the menu.   see attached images.

maybe steffi can comment on which is the correct one.

![gazebo-menus-1.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/qAj6BE/images/2079883175-gazebo-menus-1.jpg)![gazebo-menus-2.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/qAj6BE/images/4006851474-gazebo-menus-2.jpg)
content.html:
just noticed there are two styles of menu accelerators in the ui. one has the keyboard accelerator in parentheses and the the other is right-aligned in the menu. see attached images.

maybe steffi can comment on which is the correct one.
